title: Topic 001 Question 496
body: A company has an automation process. As part of the automation process, an AWS Lambda function needs to access a set of JSON documents that the company stores in an Amazon S3 bucket that uses server-side encryption with AWS KMS keys (SSE-KMS). The company uses a symmetric customer managed key
The automation process works as expected for small files. However, the automation encounters errors for files that are larger than 4 KB.
What are the MINIMUM KMS policy Action elements that will allow the company to use this key to encrypt and decrypt files that are larger than 4 KB?
